title: A&G's Kramer on Stocks: Favorite Pick is Arista Networks(Audio)
itunes:title: A&G's Kramer on Stocks: Favorite Pick is Arista Networks(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Hilary Kramer, President and Chief Investment Officer of A&G Capital, discusses the impact of the Rio Olympics on US advertisers, sponsors and Brazil stocks, and gives her current favorite U.S. equities.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
